abstract: George Polk Awards in Journalism for 2015 coverage are announced, and seven New York Times reporters are among those honored; Times journalists receive Polk Award for military reporting, for two stories investigating Navy SEALs; Polk career award goes to Simeon Booker of Jet Magazine for pioneering coverage of civil rights movement.

headline.print_headline: 7 Times Journalists Investigating Navy SEALs Are Among Winners of Polk Awards
headline.main: New York Times Journalists Among Winners of 2015 Polk Awards

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Also honored were investigations into police shootings, a civil rights journalist and a report on 35 women who have accused Bill Cosby of sexual assault.
lead_paragraph: Also honored were investigations into police shootings, a civil rights journalist and a report on 35 women who have accused Bill Cosby of sexual assault.
